Walkthru Bldg 3 – 39953
(and areas nearby)
Sunday, October 21, 2001
David Epstein

Outside Front Entrance
  • Front brown railing is a little grimy.
  • 2 front lamp lights near the entrance are burnt out. They are to the right of the entrance. ***
Gate and mailbox area
  • Sandstone, bottom right before the gate, near the palm trees, is filthy.
  • Mailbox light is dirty.
  • Bulletin board near the mailboxes is dirty.
Northwest and West Sides of building
  • On Northwest side corner of the building, the 39953 address light is filthy and not too visible (needs to have the tree trimmed around it).
  • Along West side, trim trees around lamp lights.
Interior entrance (1st floor)
  • Facing the elevator, 1st antique light on the left has 2 mini bulbs burnt out.
  • Facing the elevator, 2nd antique light on the right has 2 bulbs missing, plus exterior frame is broke.
  • Plug near 122 needs to be replastered around perimeter.
  • Door of 123 is marked and scratched.
  • Right exit door near 123 has scratches.
  • Carpet stains near 126 and 127.
  • Dirty fluorescents near 126 and 127.
Interior fountain area
  • Fountain is broke.
1st floor North Exterior tile area
  • Tiles slightly dirty
  • Tile area between 1st and 2nd floor is dirty.
1st floor hallways
  • Some dirt on wall near 118
  • 118 door has some dirty
  • Slight rug stain near 120
  • Scratches on wooden exit doors
  • Trash needs to be removed near elevator.
  • Scratches on elevator door and trim.
1st floor Southwest Exterior tile area
  • Bad crack in concrete. Could be a safety issue as people could trip. ***
  • Filthy fluorescent light.
2nd floor North Exterior tile area
  • Tiles slightly dirty.
  • Dirty fluorescent light.
2nd floor hallways
  • Slight carpet stains near 226
  • Loose plug across from 226
  • Carpet stain near Telephone Equipment Room, 223, and alcove.
  • Shopping carts in both alcoves.
  • Top of ashtray is missing.
  • Scratches on elevator door.
  • 3 bulbs burnt out in antique lamp near elevator.
  • Loose plug outlet near 217.
  • Grime and dirt on 220, 221, and 226 doors
2nd floor Southwest Exterior area
  • Fluorescent light filthy
  • Tiles a little dirty.
3rd Floor hallways

  • Dirty fluorescent lights (particularly near the elevator)
  • Loose plug outlet near 322
  • Need screen northwest window
  • Chipped brown paint on elevator door trim.
  • 2 footprints on the elevator door.
  • Plug outlet near 323 can be pushed in.
  • Slight carpet stain near utility room
  • Top screw is loose in the Mirtone Fire Alarm Signal outlet, near 323.
  • Scratch on exterior handle of Southwest exit door.
3rd/2nd floor Southwest Exterior tile/stair area
  • Brown 3rd floor railing has birdshit and/or white paint.
  • Tiles are a little dirty.
  • Fluorescent light between 2nd and 3rd floor is filthy.
Interior Stairway
  • Little pink spot on carpet between 2nd & 3rd floor.
  • Graffiti on interior 2nd floor door. Door is also dirty.
  • Scratch on exterior of 2nd floor door.
Elevator Interior
  • Generally clean except for some markings on tiles.
